trans-unit.source: Delete a resource group from the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: Delete a resource group from the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: When you delete a resource group, all of its dependent resources are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: When you delete a resource group, all of its dependent resources are also deleted.

trans-unit.source: Deleting a resource group also deletes all of its template deployments and currently stored operations.
trans-unit.target: Deleting a resource group also deletes all of its template deployments and currently stored operations.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8d088ecc-26eb-42e9-8acc-fe929ed33563#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to resource groups.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8d088ecc-26eb-42e9-8acc-fe929ed33563#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to resource groups.

trans-unit.source: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name of the resource group that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name of the resource group that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: This is an asynchronous operation that returns a status of 202 until all resources and the resource group are successfully deleted.
trans-unit.target: This is an asynchronous operation that returns a status of 202 until all resources and the resource group are successfully deleted.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> response header contains the URI that is used to obtain the status of the process.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> response header contains the URI that is used to obtain the status of the process.

trans-unit.source: While the process is running, a call to the URI in the Location header returns a status of 202.
trans-unit.target: While the process is running, a call to the URI in the Location header returns a status of 202.

trans-unit.source: When the process finishes and is successful, the URI in the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> header returns a status of 200.
trans-unit.target: When the process finishes and is successful, the URI in the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> header returns a status of 200.

trans-unit.source: If the asynchronous request failed, the URI in the Location header returns an error level status code.
trans-unit.target: If the asynchronous request failed, the URI in the Location header returns an error level status code.

trans-unit.source: The resource group is successfully deleted only if the deletion of all dependent resources also succeeds.
trans-unit.target: The resource group is successfully deleted only if the deletion of all dependent resources also succeeds.
